Package arcade.core.env.location

Interface Location

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatchLocation, PatchLocationHex, PatchLocationRect, PottsLocation, PottsLocation2D, PottsLocation3D, PottsLocations, PottsLocations2D, PottsLocations3D
    public interface Location
    A Location object defines the cell location within the environment.

    Each agent has a Location that identifies where they are within the Grid (relative to other agents) and the Lattice (local molecule concentrations).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      LocationContainer convert​(int id)
      Converts the location into a LocationContainer.

      Gets the height of the location.
      double getSurface()
      Gets the surface area of the location.
      double getVolume()
      Gets the volume of the location.
